rotate_lever.description: Rotate the lever to start the coffee brewing process.

rotate_rotor.description: Rotate the rotor to modify the grind setting.

clean_coffee_machine.description: Clean the coffee machine body to remove any residues.

prepare_coffee.description: Prepare a coffee by interacting with the lever and rotor.

clean_whole_CoffeeMachine.description: Clean the whole coffee machine to remove any dust or residue.
